name: Dropbox
natural_language_description: 这是 Dropbox 节点。主要用于: Access data on Dropbox

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.description: Means of authenticating with the service
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: Means of authenticating with the service | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: query

path.name: path
path.description: The path of which to list the content
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Path | 作用: The path of which to list the content

toPath.name: toPath
toPath.description: The new path of file or folder
toPath.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Path | 作用: The new path of file or folder | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file to upload

query.name: query
query.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments. | (必填项)

fileStatus.name: fileStatus
fileStatus.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.
fileStatus.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Status | 作用: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments. | 默认值: active

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: include_deleted (值: None) - Whether the results will include entries for files and folders that used to exist but were deleted. The default for this field is False.

include_has_explicit_shared_members (值: None) - Whether the results will include a flag for each file indicating whether or not that file has any explicit members. The default for this field is False.
include_mounted_folders (值: None) - Whether the results will include entries under mounted folders which includes app folder, shared folder and team folder. The default for this field is True.
include_non_downloadable_files (值: None) - Whether to include files that are not downloadable, i.e. Google Docs. The default for this field is True.
recursive (值: None) - Whether the list folder operation will be applied recursively to all subfolders and the response will contain contents of all subfolders. The default for this field is False.
